mapper.select: select A.jepm, A.acorp, A.key1, A.jepm_size, A.ijaego_su1 as jqty , B.jpum as jpumnm, B.jgugek as jgugek , B.jsize as jsize, B.jmodel_code as jmodel_code, B.jcolor_code as jcolor_code, B.jcustomer_code as jcustomer_code, substring(A.key1, 5,2)+ '.' + substring(A.key1, 7,2) as ipdate from JEGO_JEPMJANAK A WITH (NOLOCK) , JCODE3 B WITH (NOLOCK) where A.jepm = B.jkey AND A.key1 between #{frdate} and #{todate} AND isnull(B.jpb_gubn,'') Like concat('%',#{jpb_gubun},'%') AND isnull(A.jepm,'') Like concat('%',#{jkey},'%') ORDER BY A.jepm

select B.jkey, B.jpum as jpumnm, B.jgugek as jgugek , B.jsize as jsize, B.jmodel_code as jmodel_code, B.jcolor_code as jcolor_code, B.jcustomer_code as jcustomer_code, convert(integer, DBO.DF_TB_PCODE_JQTY(B.jkey, #{frdate}, #{todate}) ) as jqty from JCODE3 B WITH (NOLOCK) where isnull(B.jkey,'') Like concat('%',#{jkey},'%') ORDER BY B.jkey
mapper.insert: insert into JEGO_JEPMJANAK (jepm, acorp, key1, jepm_size, ijaego_su1) values (#{jepm}, #{acorp}, #{key1}, #{jepm_size}, #{ijaego_su1})
mapper.update: UPDATE JEGO_JEPMJANAK SET ijaego_su1 = #{ijaego_su1} where jepm = #{jepm} and key1 = #{key1}
